option.name: template
option.value: #if($field.modifierStatic) static ## #end Optional<$field.type> ## #set($name = $StringUtil.capitalizeWithJavaBeanConvention($StringUtil.sanitizeJavaIdentifier($helper.getPropertyName($field, $project)))) #if ($field.boolean && $field.primitive) is## #else get## #end ${name}() { return Optional.ofNullable($field.name); }
